summary: This mod add new companion Frost Mage named Sam
descriptionHtml:
[center][IMG]http://i1075.photobucket.com/albums/w422/Den987/ScreenShot315.png[/IMG]
[size=4]This mod add new companion Frost Mage named Sam
Fixed Bugs
Location : Rorikstead (Frost Fruit Inn)
Stats : High
Level: Calculated
Essential
[color=red]Requirements[/color]:  Apachii Sky Hair
[color=green] Recommended[/color]: High Res Maps for Men by Geonox
Write you advice and your opinion in comments and if you like it upload pics here[/size][/center]
author: Den987
